dmca.title: Urban Ore Domain Name Registration
dmca.body:
Dear [Private]

This office is general counsel to Urban Ire Inc. a California corporation, a nationally recognized reuse and recycling company. Urban Ore Inc. obtained federal registration of the trademark Urban Ore in 1993. Your use of this trademark in your domain name violates Urban Ore Inc.'s protected trademark. 

Please cease and desist using this domain name and cancel your registration within 10 days of the date of this letter or legal action will be taken promptly. 

Very truly yours, 


cc: Interport Communications
